Package id.passageidentity.passage4j.core.http

Interface PassageHttpClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
PassageHttpClientImpl
public interface PassageHttpClient
Interface for an HTTP client.

      <T> HTTPResponse<T> get(String url, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference<T> responseType) throws Exception
      Sends an HTTP GET request to the specified URL and returns the response.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the response.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to send the request to.

      Returns:
      The HTTP response.
      Throws:
